Name: The Witch Doctor
About the game: SUMMARY Play an addictive classic 2D RPG in the style of Last Heroes and Skyfall! Lua is a Witch Doctor, a mutated magician that helps those in need, though they only repay her with disdain and prejudice. As one of the last of her kind, Lua finds out a fellow magician has evil plans to ressurrect the Gigantos, powerful beings and the source of power of Witch Doctors, fearful for the catastrophic consequences, she takes it upon herself to stop the rogue magician. FEATURES Classic Storyline Sidequests to complete Special Weapons to find Thrilling cinematic-like story moments Mouse support MORE GAMES / / /
